broody.translation[0].definitions[0].def: wishing that you had a baby
broody.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I get broody when I see baby clothes.
broody.translation[0].definitions[1].def: silent because you are thinking or worrying about something
broody.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if a female bird is broody, it wants to lay eggs or to sit on them to make the young birds break out
